spell_tooltip.description: Aimed Shot may be cast while moving during Aspect of the Cheetah and Aspect of the Cheetah's delayed effect is increased by 4 sec.
Trueshot and Volley increase the range of all shots by 30% for their duration.
Feign Death reduces damage taken by 90% for 2 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 563,173 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Black Arrow is reset. Your next Black Arrow can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
When Tar Trap is activated, all enemies in its area are rooted for 4 sec. Damage taken may break this root.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Aimed Shot deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Counter Shot interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.

Your Spotting Eagle descends from the skies, stunning your target for 5 sec.

This ability does not require line of sight when used against players.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 595,703 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Fires a magical projectile, tethering the enemy and any other enemies within 5 yds for 10 sec, stunning them for 3 sec if they move more than 5 yds from the arrow.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Movement speed increased by 4%.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 61,863 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
A powerful aimed shot that deals 869,621 Physical damage.

Shoot a stream of 10 shots at your target over 1.8 sec, dealing a total of 1.6 million Physical damage. Usable while moving.

Rapid Fire causes your next Aimed Shot to cast 20% faster.

Each shot generates 2 Focus.

Aimed Shot causes your next Arcane Shot or Multi-Shot to deal 90% more damage and cost 40% less Focus.

Your Auto Shot damage is increased by 100% but the time between your Auto Shots is increased by 2.0 sec.

Rapid Fire's damage is increased by 15%. Casting Rapid Fire grants Streamline.

 Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.

Rapid Fire shoots 3 additional shots.
Aimed Shot cooldown reduced by 1.0 sec.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 40% of your critical strike chance.

The damage bonus of Spotter's Mark is increased by 20%.

 Spotter's Mark
Damaging an enemy with abilities empowered by Precise Shots has a 30% chance to apply Spotter's Mark to the primary target, causing your next Aimed Shot to deal 40% increased damage to the target.
Your ranged auto attacks have a 8% chance to trigger Lock and Load, causing your next Aimed Shot to cost no Focus and be instant.
When Rapid Fire finishes channeling, the time between your Auto Shots is reduced by 1.0 sec for 12 sec.
Rapid Fire deals 35% additional damage, and Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.

Your Spotting Eagle gains the Tenacity specialization, granting you Endurance Training and Air Superiority.

 Endurance Training
You gain 5% increased maximum health.

 Air Superiority
Your Spotting Eagle alerts you to oncoming danger, reducing all damage you take by 3%
Your ranged ability critical strikes cause the target to bleed for an additional 15% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.

Aimed Shot now has a 15% chance and Rapid Fire now has a 25% chance to grant Deathblow.

Black Arrow critical strike damage is increased by 25%.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Black Arrow is reset. Your next Black Arrow can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Consuming Spotter's Mark grants 4% increased Haste for 10 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Multiple instances of this effect can overlap.

Increases your critical strike chance by 20% and critical strike damage by 40% for 15 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire by 60%.

Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Trueshot by 3.0 sec

Consuming Precise Shots increases the damage of your next Aimed Shot by 20% and grants Streamline.

  Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.

Casting Explosive Shot grants Streamline.

When Aimed Shot damages a target affected by your Explosive Shot, Explosive Shot instantly explodes, dealing 25% increased damage.

 Streamline
Your next Aimed Shot has its Focus cost and cast time reduced by 20%. Stacks up to 2 times.
After gaining Deathblow, your next Black Arrow will deal 75% increased damage, and shred up to 5 targets near your Black Arrow target for 35% of the damage dealt by Black Arrow over 6 sec.

Black Arrow can now benefit from Precise Shots at 25% effectiveness.

Black Arrow consumes Precise Shots.

Trueshot sends your Spotting Eagle into a frenzy, instantly applying Spotter's Mark to your target. 

During Trueshot, your chance to apply Spotter's Mark is increased by 100%.
Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire's damage is increased by 5.0%.
Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Trueshot by 3.0 sec.
Consuming Precise Shots reduces the cooldown of Aimed Shot by 0.75 sec.
Spotter's Mark now additionally increases the critical strike chance of Aimed Shot by 15%.

Damage from Rapid Fire increases the damage of Aimed Shot by 2% for 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

New stacks do not refresh duration and are removed upon casting Rapid Fire.

While Trueshot is active, consuming Precise Shots extends Trueshot's duration by 1.0 sec, up to 5.0 sec.


Additionally, Trueshot now increases the effectiveness of Streamline by 50%.

Precise Shots can now stack up to 2 times, but its damage bonus is reduced to 90%.

Casting Aimed Shot has a 100% chance to grant an additional stack of Precise Shots.
Bulletstorm now increases your critical strike damage by 2%. Additionally, Bulletstorm now stacks 5 more times.

Trueshot now increases your critical strike chance by an additional 10% and increases your critical strike damage by an additional 20%.

Additionally, Calling the Shots reduces Trueshot's cooldown by an additional 1.0 sec.

Your Kill Shot is replaced with Black Arrow.

 Black Arrow
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 746,006 Shadow damage and 85,811 Shadow damage over 14 sec. Only usable on enemies above 80% health or below 20% health.

Your auto shot now deals Shadow damage, allowing it to bypass armor.

Your auto shot has a 8% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Black Arrow is reset. Your next Black Arrow can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.
Each time Black Arrow deals damage, you have a small chance to manifest a Dark Hound to charge to your target and deal Shadow damage to nearby targets for 8 sec.
Black Arrow is now usable on enemies with greater than 80% health or less than 20% health.

Casting Black Arrow has a 15% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Black Arrow is reset. Your next Black Arrow can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Exhilaration grants you 3 sec of Survival of the Fittest.

Survival of the Fittest activates Exhilaration at 50% effectiveness.
While in combat, Disengage will chain the closest target to the ground, causing them to move 40% slower until they move 8 yards away.

Murder of Crows now deals Shadow damage.

Black Arrow's initial damage has a 25% chance to summon a Murder of Crows on your target.

 A Murder of Crows
Summons a flock of crows to attack your target, dealing 532,562 Physical damage over 15 sec.
Periodic damage from Black Arrow has a small chance to erupt in a burst of darkness, dealing 182,230 Shadow damage to all enemies near the target. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.
Casting Black Arrow while Trick Shots is active causes Black Arrow to explode upon hitting its target, dealing 942,473 Shadow damage to other nearby enemies.

While Trueshot is active, you surrender to darkness, granting you Deathblow.

Casting Black Arrow while under the effects of Withering Fire causes you to additionally fire a barrage of 2 additional Black Arrows at nearby targets at 50% effectiveness.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.5 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
